"ガルフルの肉の調達":
"What's this I hear about a tundra on
Naberius? Can it really be true? The
environment of a Tundra is extremely
harsh! Think about how lean the meat
must be. I mean, it has to be. Right?
RIGHT? Ahh... Bring me some meat from
the tundra, OK? Something from a Gulfur
would be just fine.

※ Cae de Nv.31+ Gulfurs."
